title: Jury Says Paul Haggis Raped Woman After Film Premiere
description: Mr. Haggis, a writer of the Oscar-winning films “Crash” and “Million Dollar Baby,” was sued by a film publicist after a 2013 encounter in his New York apartment.
dc:creator: Julia Jacobs
media:description: Paul Haggis said that a sexual encounter after a film premiere in 2013 was consensual. His accuser said she was raped in his apartment.
